```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(NamesR)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

About the Package

NamesR is a simple R package that provides:

- A data-set withthe most common first names in the U.S.(2013).
- It demonstrates how datasets and Shiny applications can be bundled together in an R package.
- An interactive Shiny app for visual exploration of these names and data is sourced from,

https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/whats-the-most-common-name-in-america/
